name: The Way Home (itch) (Space Shark)
description:
In a fantasy world where humans and demons co-exist...

Decide the fate of Asha as she finally returns to her hometown after all these years. Take a walk around town, visit old acquaintances, greet the people she grew up with. Your choice will influence which path she'll end up on...

For the best experience, press the "THEME" button on the right hand corner to play in the DARK THEME mode.

9 possible endings each with unique illustrations + 2 funny short endings
